text: ql -ayha alrswl-: awha allah 'ily ann jamaeat min aljini qad aistamaeuu ltlawty llqran, falamaa smewh qaluu lqwmhm: 'iinaa samiena qranana bdyeana fi blaghth wfsahth whkmh wahkamh wakhbarh, yadeu 'iilaa alhaqi walhda, fsddaqna bhdha alquran wemlna bh, walan nushrik birabina aldhy khalaqna ahdana fi ebadth
